message.entry: Close the current session and go back to the start page to select or add a new device.
An unexpected reason was encountered while closing a running applet.
There was an error running {0} with the selected device {1}.\nTry refreshing the device list or selecting a different device.
Parameter with ID "{0}" has already been added.
Clicking "Cancel" will discard all the changes and will close the tab
Clicking "Confirm" will accept all the changes and will close the tab

Getting Started
To access your device, use the following steps:
  1. Make sure your device is connected to your computer.
  2. Click Manage Add-Ons to verify that you have the support package installed for your device vendor.
  3. If you need to install a support package, click Get Hardware Support Packages.
  4. If your device does not appear in the Device List, click Refresh.
Click the Device icon in the toolstrip to begin configuring your Modbus device.
Click the Device icon in the toolstrip to add a new Raspberry Pi device.
Unhandled Hardware Manager client message "{0}". The message is not registered.
ToolstripTabGroupTags and PanelTags are not supported currently when defining contexts for hardware manager client apps.
